law.history: Repealed 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 5, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 1, effective June 8, 2011.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Business solicitation following motor vehicle accident prohibited -- Exceptions -- Penalty -- Additional sanctions by state regulating authority.
